name: For What It's Worth
wikiSummary: According to the For What It's Worth Songfacts, a toy keyboard can be heard being played in one section of this song. Drummer Steve Forrest explained that the use of such an unusual instrument was down to the easy-going atmosphere generated by producer Dave Bottril.
wikiText: According to the For What It's Worth Songfacts, a toy keyboard can be heard being played in one section of this song. Drummer Steve Forrest explained that the use of such an unusual instrument was down to the easy-going atmosphere generated by producer Dave Bottril.
